import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatButtonModule } from '@angular/material/button'; import { NgxGradientTextComponent } from '@omnedia/ngx-gradient-text'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hero', standalone: true, imports: [MatButtonModule, NgxGradientTextComponent], templateUrl: './hero.component.html', styleUrl: './hero.component.scss', }) export class HeroComponent {}

Offering affordable and highly configurable websites to small and emerging businesses to expand their digital presence.
